text: introduction
When you use CCTV mobile products and services, we may collect and use your relevant information.

We hope to explain to you through this "Privacy Policy" that when we use our services, how do we collect, use, store, and share this information, and the way we provide for you to access, update, control and protect these information.

This "Privacy Policy" is closely related to the services you use. We also hope that you can read it carefully and make a choice you think in accordance with the guidance of this "Privacy Policy" when needed.

The related technical vocabulary involved in this "Privacy Policy", we try to explain to you with concise expressions as much as possible, and provide further explanation links for your understanding.
If you use or continue to use our services, you say that you agree that we can collect, use, store and share your information according to this "Privacy Policy".

Important
Risk

text: Scope of application of privacy policy
Except for some specific services, all our services are applicable to this "Privacy Policy".
These specific services will apply specific privacy policies.

If any specific service privacy policy is inconsistent with this "Privacy Policy", the privacy policy of specific services is applied.
Please note that this "Privacy Policy" is not applicable to the following situations:
• Information collected by a third -party service (including any third -party website) accessed through our services;
• The information collected by other companies and institutions that serves advertising services in our services.
